html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11342023-11-09ECCC
ActWild Animal and Plant Protection and Regulation of International and Interprovincial Trade Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wild Animal and Plant Trade Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILD ANIMAL AND PLANT TRADE REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the import and export of raw elephant ivory and raw rhinoceros horn, unless the specimens are destined for a museum or zoo, use in scientific research or use in support of law enforcement activities; and (2) remove permit exemption for worked elephant tusk and rhinoceros horn that is a personal or household effect.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0241 Publication Date: 2023-11-22
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Regulations Amending the WILD ANIMAL AND PLANT TRADE REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the import and export of raw elephant ivory and raw rhinoceros horn, unless the specimens are destined for a museum or zoo, use in scientific research or use in support of law enforcement activities; and (2) remove permit exemption for worked elephant tusk and rhinoceros horn that is a personal or household effect.
